Title: Silpada Sterling Silver Chain with Pendants Necklace Retired - RARE
Description: Up for auction is a Silpada necklace. The necklace is an oxidized decorative link chain with a various chain dangles accented with silver, turquoise, quartz, howlite, and magnesite. The necklace is 18". It fastens with a sterling silver clasp. This necklace is retired from the 2011-2012 catalog where it was listed on page 94 as item N1985 and listed for $144. This is listed as used, but is in perfect condition and shows no sign of wear. I have too much Silpada and need to thin the jewelry box. It will ship in a Silpada box if requested. It will not be the original box, as I did not mark the boxes. I am cleaning my closets and will be listing a lot more items. Please check my other listings over the next few weeks for great women's and children's clothes, toys and jewelry Please email with questions, I won't be able to accept returns. I will combine shipping to the best of my ability. I only charge actual shipping charges. Shipping is expensive. Please consider this when bidding and don't leave negative feedback for something beyond my control.
